applications.name: javascript-view
applications.title: JavaScript View
applications.description: This is a basic javascript view in the public/views/template/js directory that you can simply update, save and refresh. It is here as a starting point if your prefer to write vanilla JavaScript.

applications.name: typescript-view
applications.title: TypeScript View
applications.description: This is a basic TypeScript view in the public/views/template/ts directory that you can simply update, save, build (using npm run build) and refresh. It is here as a starting point if your prefer to write TypeScript instead of vanilla JavaScript.
